landing_page_enhanced.goal: Turn Crew-7 into a cinematic, multi-industry AI marketplace where users can hire, rent, buy, or evolve autonomous teams powered by Web3 identity, skill portfolios, and tokenized ownership.
landing_page_enhanced.brand_tone: mythic futurism, cosmic intelligence, economic empowerment, sovereign creativity, frictionless automation.

sections.animation_prompt: A cosmic-scale neon circuit map spreads across the screen. Light nodes spawn, forming constellations that morph into silhouettes of teams: marketing, business, finance, engineering, design, legal, analytics, operations.
sections.copy_prompt: Rewrite hero copy to emphasize that Crew-7 is not just software development; it’s universal AI labor. Teams for any profession, any domain.

extra_copy.headline: Your Autonomous AI Teams for Every Mission.
extra_copy.subheadline: From code to commerce. From finance to funnels. From ideas to reality.

sections.copilot_prompt: Update hero section to show a multi-industry scope: business, finance, marketing, research, engineering. Use galaxy-like transitions where agent icons represent different professions.

sections.animation_prompt: Animated holographic cards flip in 3D space: Software Engineering Team → Marketing Crew → Business Strategy Crew → Finance Analysis Crew → Operations Crew → Event Management Crew.
sections.copy_prompt: Introduce the idea that crews can be trained for ANY PROBLEM: market research, company formation, SaaS building, investment analysis, legal summaries, event management, and more.
examples: Marketing Crew — funnels, ads, copywriting, A/B testing
Business Crew — pitch decks, business plans, competitor analysis
Finance Crew — forecasting, valuation, portfolio simulation
Startup Crew — prototype your MVP in 48 hours
Engineering Crew — full-stack SaaS, APIs, infra, deployment
sections.copilot_prompt: Create a horizontal scroll section with animated cards for various industries, narrated by Vega. Each card should glow when hovered and animate into deeper detail.

sections.animation_prompt: A futuristic bazaar of glowing crew capsules floating mid-air. Each capsule rotates with metadata: XP, skills, reputation, past missions, rental fee, specialization.
sections.copy_prompt: Emphasize that Crew-7 Marketplace is the first place where AI teams are assets with portfolios, reputations, and economic value.
key_features: Crew XP, reputation, and track record
Web3 identity: provable ownership via NFT crew tokens
sections.copilot_prompt: Create a cinematic marketplace section showing crew capsules rotating in 3D. Include ‘Rent Crew’, ‘Buy Crew’, and ‘View Portfolio’ buttons. Animate skill stats when hovering.

sections.animation_prompt: Nova opens a glowing book of light. Pages flip to reveal portfolio items: apps built, business plans created, marketing funnels shipped, financial models executed.
sections.copy_prompt: Explain that each Crew is a living CV: missions completed, hours worked, skills mastered, domains specialized in.
sections.copilot_prompt: Build a portfolio UI animation: glowing tabs switching between performance charts, mission logs, artifacts, skills, and badges. Nova narrates the scene.

sections.animation_prompt: Glowing blockchain chains spin around Helix, merging into a transparent ledger that shows Crew ownership, rental contracts, and reputation tokens.
sections.copy_prompt: Introduce the Web3 layer: crews are tokenized, reputation is immutable, ownership is provable, and rental contracts are trustless.
web3_features: Reputation Tokens and XP stored on-chain
sections.copilot_prompt: Create a section with animated blockchain nodes connecting to Crew avatars. Highlight secure ownership, rental contracts, and token-based trust systems.

sections.animation_prompt: Sigma unleashes a cosmic economic diagram: token flows, staking pools, crew earnings, rental fees, reputation token minting.
sections.copy_prompt: Introduce the Crew-7 Token Economy: users pay crews in tokens, crews earn reputation, owners stake crews to earn passive rewards.
tokenomics_components: Utility Token (C7T): used to rent, buy, or pay crews.
Reputation Token (R7): earned from successful missions.
Staking Pools: stake Crew tokens for yield.
Crew Earnings: revenue split between crew owner and Crew-7.
XP & Levels: Crew evolution over time.
sections.copilot_prompt: Create a tokenomics section using animated token flow diagrams. Sigma explains how buying, renting, XP, and staking work.

sections.animation_prompt: Atlas slams a holographic panel showing real-world use cases.
mission_types: Launch a SaaS MVP in 48 hours
Build a business plan + pitch deck
Run a full marketing funnel and analytics
Produce a financial valuation of a company
sections.copy_prompt: Show that ANYONE can command a crew to execute ANY mission.
sections.copilot_prompt: Build a animated mission-carousel with holographic panels showing 6 real-world example missions.

sections.animation_prompt: All robot avatars form a circle. A large Crew-7 logo ignites in the center like a star being born.
sections.copy_prompt: End with a cinematic, motivational finale.

final_cta.title: Assemble Your First AI Crew.
final_cta.subtitle: The future of work is autonomous. Start building with Crew-7.

sections.copilot_prompt: Create a final cinematic CTA section with all robot avatars in a dynamic ring formation and a large glowing Crew-7 logo.

global_prompts: Use deep cinematic motion and subtle sound cues for city-scale futurism.
All robot faces must animate subtly (eye blinks, micro-movements, neon pulses).
Use smooth scroll-driven storytelling with intersection observers.
Add slight camera shake on transitions for heavier scenes.
Fade in code lines and holographic UI components using matrix-style glyph trails.
Use parallax backgrounds with nebula themes and glowing grids.
